title: Device Settings Picture Resource Type
description: Smart Data Models Program adaptation of the original IoTData data Models. Gets current device picture settings.

rt.description: Property. The Resource Type of Device Settings for picture

picture-mode.description: Property. Device Settings Picture Mode. Client can change picture-mode using supported-picture-modes property.

supported-picture-modes.description: Property. An array of possible picture modes the device supports. This property should be added if picture-mode property is supported.

backlight.description: Property. Quantized representation in the range -10 to 10 of the current sensed or set value for Device Settings Picture Backlight.

contrast.description: Property. Quantized representation in the range 0-100 of the current sensed or set value for Device Settings Picture Contrast.

brightness.description: Property. Quantized representation in the range 0-100 of the current sensed or set value for Device Settings Picture Brightness.

sharpness.description: Property. Quantized representation in the range 0-100 of the current sensed or set value for Device Settings Picture Sharpness.

colour.description: Property. Quantized representation in the range 0-100 of the current sensed or set value for Device Settings Picture Colour.

colour-temperature.description: Property. Colour temperature range of -50 (Cool) to 50 (Warm).

tint.description: Property. Quantized representation in the range 0-100 of the current sensed or set value for Device Settings Picture Tint. The closer to 100, the more saturated the red colour becomes. The closer to 0, the more saturated the green colour becomes.

picture-reset.description: Property. Resets all picture settings to the default values.

picture-off.description: Property. This turns picture on and off.

aspect-ratio.description: Property. Device Settings Aspect Ratio. Client can change aspect-ratio using supported-aspect-ratio property.

supported-aspect-ratio.description: Property. An array of possible aspect ratio the device supports. This property should be added if aspect-ratio property is supported.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be settings-picture
